title: Archive a Closed Transaction File
description: A transaction has closed and funded. The agent must ensure all documents are in the file and archive it for compliance.

tasks.description: Identify a transaction that closed more than 7 days ago.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a recently closed transaction ready for archiving.

tasks.description: Run a compliance check on the transaction file to ensure all required documents (e.g., contract, disclosures, closing statement) are present.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses a checklist to verify the file is complete.

tasks.description: Change the status of the transaction file to 'Archived' in the transaction management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully archives the file, making it read-only.
